articles.description: KATE MIDDLETON and Prince William visited the headquarters of the Disasters Emergency Committee today, just 24 hours after Prince Harry gave an interview to NBC where he claimed he's keeping the Queen 'protected and has the right people around her'. What were…

articles.author: Sean O'grady
articles.title: Madonna, 63, slow dances in black corset and lace thong in racy video - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer, 63, put on a sultry display as she writhed around in the skimpy garment that highlighted her jaw-dropping figure.
articles.content:
Madonna left little to the imagination as she slow danced in a lace thong and skintight corset in a sizzling TikTok video.

articles.title: LEGO Announces Luke Skywalker's Landspeeder Star Wars Set - IGN - IGN
articles.description: LEGO has announced the Luke Skywalker Landspeeder Ultimate Collector Series set.
articles.content:
LEGO has announced the Luke Skywalker Landspeeder Ultimate Collector Series set.
Retailing for $199.99 / £174.99, the set comes with 1,890 pieces and recreates Luke's X-34 Landspeeder from Star Wars… [+1721 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Clements
articles.title: Yuja Wang review – dazzling and brilliant playing - The Guardian
articles.description: Wang’s flamboyance and virtuosity doesn’t always convey a real sense of what the music is about, but in works such as Ligeti’s Etudes she is irresistible.
articles.content: Touchingly, Yuja Wang dedicated her latest London appearance to the memory of Radu Lupu, who had died three days earlier. But its hard to imagine two more dissimilar pianists than the flamboyant, bri… [+2148 chars]

articles.author: Alexi Duggins
articles.title: Robert Morse, star of Mad Men and Broadway, dies aged 90 - The Guardian
articles.description: The actor is best known for playing Bert Cooper in the hit drama, and twice won Tony awards for stage roles
articles.content: Robert Morse, who starred in the hit US drama Mad Men, has died at the age of 90. His most well known role was as Bert Cooper, the head of the shows advertising agency, who gave his surname to the co… [+1918 chars]
